wikitext.*:
{{disambig-more|Two Towers|[[Two Towers (disambiguation)]]}}
{{book
|title=The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers Visual Companion
| image = The Lord of the Rings The Two Towers Visual Companion.jpg
|introduction=[[Viggo Mortensen]]
|author=[[Jude Fisher]]
|isbn=0618258027
|publisher=[[Houghton Mifflin]]
|date=[[6 November]] [[2002]]
|format=Hardcover
|pages= 72
| precededby=[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring Visual Companion]]
| followedby=[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King Visual Companion]]
}}
'''''The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers Visual Companion''''' features an introduction by [[Viggo Mortensen]] ([[Aragorn|Aragorn II]]) and includes over 100 photographs of the (at the time of publication) upcoming film, [[Peter Jackson]]'s ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]''. The book also includes a new map of [[Rohan]] and [[Gondor]] as well as a battle plan of the [[Battle of the Hornburg|Battle of Helm's Deep]].

==See also==

*''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring Visual Companion]]''
*''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King Visual Companion]]''
